tutorialPages.messageText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "C2E692DE4E065D93C8E5F8A895A61C39", "Glint can be sold for a small amount of gold or can be exchanged for Commodities. Commodities are a type of cargo that can only be transported by caravan. However, they can be sold for a profit in other Nodes.")
